abstract: On the block would be SABMiller’s assets in the Czech Republic, Hungary, Poland, Romania and Slovakia as it seeks approval for their merger.
snippet: On the block would be SABMiller’s assets in the Czech Republic, Hungary, Poland, Romania and Slovakia as it seeks approval for their merger.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Anheuser-Busch InBev said on Friday that it had offered to sell the Central and Eastern European operations of SABMiller in order to win approval from European regulators for their more than $100 billion merger.

headline.main: Anheuser-Busch InBev Offers to Sell More SABMiller Assets in Europe
